Committee.definition: a person to whom a charge

1.definition: a person to whom a charge (as an incompetent) is committed compare,,,

2 a.definition: a body of persons delegated or assigned to consider, investigate, act on, or report on some mattera group of fellow legislators chosen by a legislative body to consider legislative matters (as drafting bills or conducting hearings) [the Senate judiciary ] see also,

sub_terms.b: a private organization for the promotion of a common object [political action] compare
